singular: Archaic in Middle Egyptian when modifying a noun.From Middle Egyptian, this feminine singular form was generally used for the plural.In Late Egyptian, the masculine singular form was used with all nouns.
ꜣpd: Archaic in Middle Egyptian when modifying a noun.From Middle Egyptian, this feminine singular form was generally used for the plural.In Late Egyptian, the masculine singular form was used with all nouns.
